Title: Tweeterati
Description: Tweeterati is a Windows based twitter client written in WPF. The goal of this application is to be as full-featured as TweetDeck (http://www.tweetdeck.com).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Tweeterati is a Windows based twitter client written in WPF. The goal of this application is to be as full-featured as TweetDeck (http://www.tweetdeck.com).
